by VLDLR-associated cerebellar hypoplasia ?,VLDLR-associated cerebellar hypoplasia is rare; its prevalence is unknown. The condition was first described in the Hutterite population in Canada and the United States. This condition has also been reported in families from Iran and Turkey.,GHR,VLDLR-associated cerebellar hypoplasia
